post:
Hello,

We'd like to announce our new promo-package. [NQhost.com](http://nqhost.com) has a [number
of offers](http://lowendbox.com/tag/nqhost-com/) on LEB starting from 2010.

So, the new offer, this is Windows VPS (Windows Server 2003 R2 32bit only with license under SPLA).

Pricing - $20/quarterly, [direct link to order](https://crm.nqhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=109)

RAM - 512MB RAM

Disk Space - 20GB of RAID-10 storage 

Bandwidth Transfer - Unmetered Transfer / Port Speed - 100Mbit shared port / vCPU(s) - 2 CPU (2.8 Ghz) / IPv4 & IPv6 - One IPv4 address / Virtualization Type/Platform - Xen / Virtualization Control Panel - SolusVM

Payment Methods - credit cards, PayPal, Skrill (moneybookers), WebMoney, Yandex.Money

Network Test - http://nqhost.com/lg/100MBtest.zip

Thank you.
